participant_1.background:
I don't dye my hair, because I like my natural color.
My family is very supportive and encouraging
My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet.
I enjoyed going to the theater this weekend and watching a play with my family.
I love watching Gila chase the sunbeams around my living room.

participant_2.background:
I drove my Mercedes through the Arizona desert.
my mom is a nurse.
i love to crochet.
My family is supportive and encouraging of my passion for designer French fries.
I look dapper while walking my clients' dogs.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to?
Hi there! I'm crocheting a hat and watching a movie.
That's a cool hat! What kind of movie?
It's a documentary about the Arizona desert.
Oh cool! I love the desert! I went on a road trip through there last year.
That sounds amazing! Did you see any wild animals?
Yeah, we saw a lot of lizards and a few rattlesnakes.
That's so cool! I wish I could have gone with you.
Next time you're in the area, let me know! I'd love to show you around.
So, what's your favorite thing about crocheting?
I love that I can make anything I want.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to crochet.
You should! It's really easy to get started.
I might just have to do that. Thanks for the inspiration!
